Title: Relates to insurance fraud; appropriation
Summary: Relates to insurance fraud; provides a provision for compensation to a person that reports insurance fraud to the authorities; establishes crimes of unlawful procurement of clients, patients or customers; aggravated insurance fraud in the second degree; and aggravated insurance fraud in the first degree; provides that this act also increases the penalty for insurance fraud; appropriates $3,100,000 therefor.
LawCode: Add ยง405-a, Ins L; amd Pen L, generally; amd ยง846-m, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, the penal law and the executive law, in relation to insurance fraud; and making an appropriation therefor
